sqlMap.select: SELECT E.NOTE, E.GUBN_NM, E.LAW_CNT, F.ORG_FILE_NM, E.TITLE FROM T_ETC E LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FILE F ON E.SEQ_ETC = F.TABLE_SEQ AND F.TABC_TYP = 'ET' AND F.RECODE_ST='A' WHERE SEQ_ETC=#seq#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ETC.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO T_ETC (SEQ_ETC,GUBN_NM,TECT_TYP,REG_ID,REG_DT,RECODE_ST,LAW_CNT, NOTE,TITLE) VALUES(#seq#, #gubn_nm#, '02', #reg_id#, sysdate, 'A', #law_cnt#, #note#, #title#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_ETC SET GUBN_NM = #gubn_nm#, TITLE = #title#, NOTE = #note#, LAW_CNT = #law_cnt#, UPD_ID=#reg_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE SEQ_ETC = #seq#
sqlMap.insert: insert into T_FILE (TABLE_SEQ ,TABC_TYP, FILE_DIR,ORG_FILE_NM ,FILE_SIZE ,SEQ_FILE, FILE_ID, REG_ID, REG_DT, RECODE_ST, FILE_NM) VALUES(#seq# ,'ET', #file_dir_nm# ,#file_org_nm# ,#file_size# ,SEQ_FILE.nextval, #file_id#, #reg_id#, sysdate, 'A', #file_name#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_FILE SET RECODE_ST = 'D', UPD_ID=#reg_id#, UPD_DT=sysdate WHERE TABLE_SEQ = #seq# AND TABC_TYP='ET' AND RECODE_ST='A'
UPDATE T_ETC SET RECODE_ST = 'D' WHERE SEQ_ETC = #seq#
